markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Acrobat Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1873) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Dedication" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=41" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 155 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Acrobat](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=45)

**Prerequisites**
Trained in [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1)

</column>

---

You become an expert in [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1). At 7th level, you become a master in Acrobatics, and at 15th level, you become legendary in Acrobatics. Whenever you critically succeed at an Acrobatics check to [Tumble Through](/Actions.aspx?ID=29) an enemy's space, you don't treat the enemy's space as difficult terrain.

**Special** You can't select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the acrobat archetype.

<title level="2">Acrobat Dedication leads to...</title>
[Contortionist](/Feats.aspx?ID=1874), [Dodge Away](/Feats.aspx?ID=1875), [Graceful Leaper](/Feats.aspx?ID=1876), [Mockingbird's Disarm](/Feats.aspx?ID=4148), [Quick Spring](/Feats.aspx?ID=4151), [Show-Off](/Feats.aspx?ID=4144), [Tumbling Opportunist](/Feats.aspx?ID=1878), [Tumbling Strike](/Feats.aspx?ID=1877)
name: Acrobat Dedication
